meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I prebade my friend farewell before he left for his trip.
meanings.sent2: She prebade her guests to come early for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat prebade the mouse to stay away from its food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The teacher prebade the students to complete their homework before the weekend.
meanings.sent5: The wise old owl prebade the young birds to listen closely to his stories.

meanings.sent1: The prebade instructions were clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: He followed the prebade rules without question.
meanings.sent3: The prebade schedule made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The prebade decision saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The prebade plan was executed perfectly by the team.
